titleStmt.title: To the honorable societies of Gray's-Inne, and of the rest of the innes of court, and to all the professors of the law
titleStmt.author: Jenkins, David, 1582-1663.

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed at end: 28 ̊Aprilis 1647. David Jenkins. Now prisoner in the Tower.
Reproductions of the originals in the Huntington Library and the California State Library, Sutro branch.
